docs.snippet: Oil prices surged on Friday, as a weaker dollar encouraged buying but investors remained cautious after Russian production figures showed weak compliance with a global deal to cut output....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oil prices surged on Friday, as a weaker dollar encouraged buying but investors remained cautious after Russian production figures showed weak compliance with a global deal to cut output.

headline.main: Oil Rebounds From Recent Weakness, Remains Range Bound
headline.print_headline: Oil Rebounds From Recent Weakness, Remains Range Bound

docs.snippet: The president of the film academy has sent an email to its members telling them they have much to be proud of after this year's Oscars ceremony, and reassuring them changes will be made to avoid a repeat of problems like the botched best-picture a...
docs.lead_paragraph: The president of the film academy has sent an email to its members telling them they have much to be proud of after this year's Oscars ceremony, and reassuring them changes will be made to avoid a repeat of problems like the botched best-picture announcement that closed the show.

headline.main: Film Academy President Reassures Members After Oscar Botch
headline.print_headline: Film Academy President Reassures Members After Oscar Botch

docs.snippet: Former Chelsea midfielder Dennis Wise has likened N'Golo Kante to club great Claude Makelele and said the 25-year-old's stellar performance is one of the reasons the London side appear to be cruising towards the Premier League title....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Chelsea midfielder Dennis Wise has likened N'Golo Kante to club great Claude Makelele and said the 25-year-old's stellar performance is one of the reasons the London side appear to be cruising towards the Premier League title.

headline.main: 'Unsung Hero' Kante Pushing Chelsea Towards Title-Wise
headline.print_headline: 'Unsung Hero' Kante Pushing Chelsea Towards Title-Wise

docs.snippet: Britain's smaller companies are hoarding cash and cutting investment, bankers say, a sign of business confidence starting to wobble as the government sets off down the uncertain path of leaving the European Union....

docs.snippet: Beijing's escalating condemnation of South Korea over a U.S. anti-missile system has triggered protests against a popular retail giant and a reported ban on Chinese tour groups visiting the country, apparent signs that Beijing plans to make Seoul ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Beijing's escalating condemnation of South Korea over a U.S. anti-missile system has triggered protests against a popular retail giant and a reported ban on Chinese tour groups visiting the country, apparent signs that Beijing plans to make Seoul pay an economic price over a move that China says threatens its security.

headline.main: Protests Mount in China Against South Korea's Missile System
headline.print_headline: Protests Mount in China Against South Korea's Missile System

headline.main: Aguero to Hold Talks With City in June Over Future
headline.print_headline: Aguero to Hold Talks With City in June Over Future

docs.snippet: Pittsburgh Pirate third baseman Kang Jung-ho was handed a suspended prison sentence for drunk driving in his native South Korea on Friday, the Seoul Central District Court confirmed, clearing him to join his team for Spring Training....
